'''<samp>map_decorations.png-atlas</samp>''' is a procedurally-generated [[texture atlas]] used to store textures for [[map]] icons.

== Format ==
<samp>map_decorations.png-atlas</samp> is a generated 64&times;64-pixel file that stores textures for map icons.
